ai-tha-ap181:1.4_0: the large conscious population will bring happiness,
ai-tha-ap181:2.1_0: having seen the ascetic had answered:
ai-tha-ap181:2.2_0: Ethics are the best broad earth;
ai-tha-ap181:2.4_0: Then he gave me medicine to that medicine.
ai-tha-ap181:3.1_0: and gave it to a disease.
ai-tha-ap181:4.2_0: with which I’m here and there,
ai-tha-ap181:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap181:4.4_0: This is the fruit of medicine.
ai-tha-ap181:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Timbaruka.
ai-tha-ap181:8.1_0: the ninth Elder Nuns had a ninth (who was) a ninth,
